name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Henan rural bank depositors collectively flooded their screens with messages under a report on financial security by Li Yunze, director of the State Financial Regulatory Administration, during the two sessions.

content: Breaking news! At 8:00 am on March 13, an explosion occurred at the intersection of Xueyuan Street and Yingbin Road in Yanjiao Town, Sanhe City, Langfang City, Hebei Province. The cause of the explosion is still unclear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 13, Shangqiu, Henan. Owners of two unfinished projects, Evergrande and Greenland, came to the government building on the same day to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "It doesn't matter who comes" CCTV reporter was interrupted by local police and government officials while reporting live from the Yanjiao explosion site

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of 12:00 noon, the rescue work for the Yanjiao explosion in Hebei Province is nearing completion. According to the director of the Sanhe City Emergency Management Bureau in Hebei Province, 28 people have been rescued so far, and the latest data shows that 2 people died and 26 were injured. The open fire has been extinguished. It was initially determined to be caused by a gas leak.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of March 13, the owners of Yongji Zhuangyuanfu in Zhanhe District, Pingdingshan City, Henan Province went to the Zhanhe District People's Government to defend their rights to protest the government's misleading reply on March 7. This project has been unfinished for more than ten years.
At the entrance of the Zhanhe District People's Visit Reception Center, the police snatched the owners' banners, causing a conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of March 13, the owners of the second phase of Hengda Junrui Mansion in Pingdingshan blocked the road and knelt down to defend their rights. It is reported that when the owners bought the house, they were promised fine decoration, but now they are directly delivered in rough condition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 12, Shantou, Guangdong. Outside the Goutou Village Health Station, a three-year-old girl died while receiving an IV drip at the station.
Family members threw paper money and smashed the door outside the health station. That night, the police set up a cordon around the health station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 9, a young woman suddenly broke down on a bus in Heilongjiang, angrily criticizing young people for working like slaves but not making any money, while the elderly took walks all day and their pensions were only over 10,000 yuan a month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the explosion in Yanjiao, at noon that day, TEDA Gas, one of the two gas companies in Yanjiao, issued an announcement that a total of 50 communities and units in Yanjiao would be shut down from March 13.
On February 21, Sanhe City had just held a city-wide work meeting on the concentrated rectification of production safety in the month (as of press time, the article has been deleted). This means that at present, Sanhe, Hebei is still in the period of concentrated rectification of safety.
On March 12, the "Sanhe Emergency Management" public account also issued the "March Production Safety Risk Warning", which mentioned that in the field of gas, it is necessary to carry out a "look back" on the special rectification of urban and rural gas safety, and focus on the rural gas safety governance issues of "gas, cylinders, valves, pipes, networks, and environment", conduct a thorough investigation, and rectify the entire chain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online reports, on February 26, at a construction site near the Yanjiao explosion site, someone hung a banner that read, "Barbaric construction affects personal safety, the people hope someone will take charge of their demands."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 12, a strange notice occurred in Xuzhou No. 1 Middle School.
On February 29, a student was mistakenly photographed and reported by the surveillance camera while eating a chocolate bar during class.
Although the Moral Education Department confirmed after investigation that the student was holding a chocolate bar, the school not only did not apologize to the student, but instead criticized him in a notice, saying that he ate the chocolate bar to "attract attention" and "foolishly show his presence", making him realize that "a gentleman should not stand under a dangerous wall"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Full video 
The police on the scene interrupted the live broadcast because it was "too dangerous"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 10, a student in Jiudian Village, Handan, Hebei was killed after being blackmailed by his classmates. According to online reports, three middle school students transferred all the money in Wang Ziyao's mobile phone. Then they tricked Wang Ziyao into a greenhouse, brutally killed him and buried his body. Afterwards, the family and the police visited the child many times to inquire about his condition, but the suspect refused to explain and went to school normally during that period. It was not until the next day that the family checked the surveillance and found one of the main culprits, a first-year junior high school student. At first, the student refused to admit it, but finally, with the identification of the other two students, the body was found in a vegetable shed a hundred meters away from the main culprit's home. The body was horrible, with a bloody face.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 13th, family members protested at the scene of the incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After education, medical care, and games, the pressure has come to e-commerce and express delivery.
Since the implementation of the new express delivery regulations, netizens in many places have reported that ZTO Express has serious backlogs and delayed delivery, and some have even been delayed for about a week. Some bloggers have received text messages clearly stating that they cannot deliver in time due to a shortage of manpower.
On March 13, a staff member of ZTO Wuhan Transit Department said that the Moore City outlet in Wuhan has stopped sending express due to insufficient staff, and is doing its best to deliver the backlog of express parcels. The outlet has been abnormal from the year before to now, and some ZTO couriers have resigned before the year before. In addition, ZTO Express in Jinan, Shandong said that there are adjustments to sales staff in many areas, and some areas are not particularly sufficient. There have been recent resignations, and adjustments have been made. Express delivery has been delivered all the time, and there may be delays. ZTO Express in Xi'an, Shaanxi said that some couriers have resigned due to the new regulations, and are currently short of staff and are arranging delivery.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 12, blogger Hu Chenfeng, who has repeatedly posted videos on the purchasing power of domestic workers' daily wages, tested the purchasing power of a local dishwasher's daily wage of 50 Singapore dollars (about 260 yuan) in Singapore.
He used 50 Singapore dollars to buy 30 eggs, 2 liters of milk, 2 catties of chicken, 280 grams of pork, 330 grams of pork liver, 264 grams of pork stuffing, one catty of oxtail, two dragon fruits, two catties of potatoes, 642 grams of eggplant, 200 grams of Chinese cabbage, and 200 grams of amaranth in a local large supermarket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens tested it in a domestic online supermarket and found that the price of purchasing the above food was about 328 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of March 13, another CCTV reporter Xu Mengzhe released a video of himself being pushed and blocked by more than a dozen police officers while interviewing at the Yanjiao explosion site.
Currently, Xu Mengzhe's account "Xu Mengzhe1987" can no longer be searched.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 13, a tower crane collapsed in Luo Village, Foshan, Guangdong. According to local netizens, people were injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to multiple sources, the incident may have occurred during the Chinese New Year, around February 10th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 12, in Langfang, Hebei, a lawyer reported the Langfang Yanda Group under his real name, saying that the warehouse was sold as commercial housing. The warehouse cannot be lived in and can only store non-combustible materials such as fiberglass. Once a fire breaks out, the consequences will be disastrous.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The incident of Yanjiao government blocking CCTV reporters is getting worse
On the evening of March 13, the China Journalists Association published an article "Legal Interviews Are the Rights of Journalists" to support the CCTV reporters who were blocked today.
Hu Xitui also issued an article stating that local governments should provide convenience for news without interrupting on-site rescue, rather than interfering and stopping it.

content:
"Big Exposure Movement"
On the evening of March 13, workers in Hangzhou, Xiamen and other places suddenly began to collectively complain and expose the exploitation of employees and unreasonable behaviors in their respective companies in Tencent's shared documents.
So far, the Xiamen document has been updated to more than 300 companies. A video shows that the number of people viewing the Hangzhou document online at the same time is as high as 600.
